titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the right honourable the Lord Mayor and aldermen of the city of London in Guild-hall chappel upon Sunday the 20th of January, 1688/9 / by Samuel Barton, Chaplain of St. Saviours.
titleStmt.author: Barton, Samuel, 1647 or 8-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
